termsString:
📝 Terms and Conditions â€“ LNK
Last Updated: May 20, 2025

Welcome to LNK, a digital platform that connects companies and brokers to facilitate real estate sales and rentals. By using our app, you agree to the following Terms and Conditions:

1.⁠ ⁠Definitions
"User": Refers to any company or broker using the application.

"Service": The digital platform provided by LNK.

2.⁠ ⁠Account Registration and Use
You must be a legally registered company or a certified broker to use this app.

You are responsible for the accuracy of your registration data and for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

3.⁠ ⁠User Obligations
Use the platform only for lawful business purposes.

Do not use the service for fraudulent, illegal, or unauthorized purposes.

Do not share your login credentials with third parties.

4.⁠ ⁠Intellectual Property
All copyrights, designs, and content within the app are the property of LNK. You may not copy, reuse, or redistribute any content without written permission.

5.⁠ ⁠Disclaimer
LNK is not responsible for any off-platform transactions or damages resulting from misuse of the platform.

6.⁠ ⁠Changes to Terms
LNK reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the platform after changes implies acceptance of the updated terms.
contactTitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
